analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/31/0xecea1d051a5c3339983ecc2dbdc3f38a7f52c636.sol:
	Contract Nerotoken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/31/0xecea1d051a5c3339983ecc2dbdc3f38a7f52c636.sol#208)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/31/0xecea1d051a5c3339983ecc2dbdc3f38a7f52c636.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/31/0xecea1d051a5c3339983ecc2dbdc3f38a7f52c636.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/31/0xecea1d051a5c3339983ecc2dbdc3f38a7f52c636.sol#80) is not in mixedCase
